.gito/config.toml.title: Invalid JSON syntax in prompt template
.gito/config.toml.details: The JSON schema example in the prompt template (line 170) contains an extraneous semicolon after the opening bracket of the 'affected_lines' array, making it invalid JSON. This could mislead the AI or cause downstream parsing errors. The line should be corrected to remove the semicolon, restoring valid JSON syntax.

reviews/code-review-report.md.title: Critical security risk in pickle serialization
reviews/code-review-report.md.details: Untrusted pickle loading introduces a critical vulnerability enabling arbitrary code execution.

27: 22:     contents = file.read()
